title: Thunderstorm watches and heavy rain warnings: Which North Island regions are affected today
description: MetService warns thunderstorms could trigger flash flooding and make driving hazardous.
content:
The warning comes as the dreary summer weather continues for many, with a slew of severe thunderstorm watches in place across the top half of the North Island.
Thunderstorms are already occurring in… [+2848 chars]
de: Gewitterwarnungen und Starkregenwarnungen: Welche Nordinselregionen heute betroffen sind. MetService warnt davor, dass Gewitter Sturzfluten auslösen und das Fahren gefährlich machen könnten.
en: Thunderstorm watches and heavy rain warnings: Which North Island regions are affected today. MetService warns thunderstorms could trigger flash flooding and make driving hazardous.
la: Tonitruum vigiliae et pluviae admonitiones graves: quae regiones Island septentrionales hodie afficiuntur. MetService monet tonitribus felis micare inundationem et facere ancipitia pellere.
